alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Johnson; Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:35AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hardin, central Pope, southeastern Johnson, northern Crittenden, northern Livingston, southern Union and southwestern Webster Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1235 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sturgis to Dixon Springs. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sturgis around 1240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Clay, Joy, Dixon and Burna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
